thread.title: Gorgeous new resort in Indonesia named ‘the best in the world’ (20 photos)
thread.title_full: Gorgeous new resort in Indonesia named ‘the best in the world’ (20 photos)

author: Alex
title: Gorgeous new resort in Indonesia named ‘the best in the world’ (20 photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
This gorgeous oceanside resort built on a remote Indonesian island was hailed as “the best in the world” by Travel + Leisure in 2016. Known as “Nihiwatu” and built in 2015 by fashion entrepreneur Chris Burch, the impressive digs boast a spa under a waterfall as well as a private butler and plunge pool in all 27 exclusive rooms. 2
